The SFSU Acoustic Ecology Lab conducts research using passive acoustic monitoring to information marine and estuarine conservation. We are part of the [Estuary and Ocean Science Center](https://eoscenter.sfsu.edu) at [San Francisco State University](https://www.sfsu.edu).

This lab manual serves as the go-to handbook for the behind-the-scenes information to support our science.


***Want to Copy this Lab Manual Format?***

*Use the [PAM_template_lab_manual](https://github.com/nmfs-ost/PAM_template_lab_manual) following [these methods](https://nmfs-ost.github.io/PAM_template_lab_manual/#how-to-use-this-template).*
